name: Our Last Hope (SzymonSroka)
description: The game is a bullet hell which focuses on a story when progressing though the game. The game is also based on a wave system, having 20 waves to complete before the finale. Both main characters seen in the game are sent to save the world from a nuclear invasion, so they have to go through a base of enemies to be able to stop them from firing nukes. The game features a fair and cooperative buying mechanic so when progressing through the game you can be stronger with each wave of enemies.
